responses: Namaste! I am your Kisan Assistant. Ask me about Crops, Mandi Prices, or Schemes.
Ram Ram! How can I help you with your farming today?
Hello! I can help you with seeds, fertilizers, weather, and market rates.
Goodbye! Happy Farming.
See you soon. May your harvest be plentiful!
Bye! Check the app later for updated Mandi prices.
I was created by the KrishiMitra Team as a Final Year MSc Project.
I am an AI built to help Indian farmers, developed by a student developer.
You can check the live weather widget on your Dashboard for accurate local details.
It looks sunny today, good for harvesting. Check the dashboard for a 7-day forecast.
Monsoon predictions are updated on the home screen. Please verify there.
Tractor prices start from ₹3.5 Lakh (Mini) to ₹12 Lakh (Heavy Duty). Popular brands are Mahindra, Swaraj, and Sonalika.
You can rent or buy second-hand tractors in our 'Equipment Hub'. Check the menu!
Government provides up to 30% subsidy on new tractors under the SMAM scheme.
Rotavators cost between ₹80,000 to ₹1.2 Lakh. Subsidies are available.
Combine Harvesters are expensive (₹20 Lakh+). It is better to rent one from our Equipment Hub.
Drone spraying is the new technology. It costs about ₹500 per acre for service.
Wheat is a Rabi crop sown in Nov-Dec. Best varieties include HD-2967 and DBW-187.
Wheat needs 4-6 irrigations. Critical stage is CRI (21 days after sowing).
Current Wheat MSP is around ₹2125 per quintal. Market rates may vary.
Rice (Paddy) is a Kharif crop. It needs standing water for the first 40 days.
Basmati 1121 and 1509 are high-value export varieties fetching ₹3500+ per quintal.
Common diseases: Blast and Stem Borer. Use Tricyclazole for Blast control.
Cotton is a cash crop. BT Cotton protects against American Bollworm but watch out for Pink Bollworm.
Sowing time: May-June. Harvest: Oct-Nov. Avoid waterlogging in the field.
For Pink Bollworm, use pheromone traps and spray Emamectin Benzoate if severe.
Sugarcane is a long-duration crop (10-12 months). CO-0238 is the most popular high-yield variety.
Red Rot is a major threat. Treat seed sets with Carbendazim before planting.
FRP (Fair Remunerative Price) for sugarcane is fixed by the govt, approx ₹305/quintal.
Maize can be grown in all three seasons (Kharif, Rabi, Zaid). It is sensitive to waterlogging.
Fall Armyworm is the biggest enemy of Maize. Check whorls and spray Coragen if needed.
Market rate for Maize is approx ₹2000-₹2400 per quintal.
Potato is sown in Oct-Nov. It needs loose, sandy loam soil for good tuber growth.
Late Blight is dangerous. Spray Mancozeb as a preventive measure during cloudy weather.
Store potatoes in cold storage to sell later at higher prices (₹10-15/kg vs ₹5/kg at harvest).
Tomatoes are highly profitable but risky due to price fluctuation (₹5 to ₹100/kg).
Leaf Curl Virus is spread by Whiteflies. Use sticky traps and remove infected plants immediately.
Staking (giving support) increases tomato yield by 30%.
Onion prices are volatile. Rabi onion (harvested April) has the best storage life.
Stop irrigation 10-15 days before harvesting to prevent rotting in storage.
Major market: Lasalgaon (Nashik) sets the onion trend for India.
Soybean is a major Kharif oilseed. Sowing: June-July.
Yellow Mosaic Virus is a common issue. Control whiteflies to prevent it.
MSP for Soybean is around ₹4600 per quintal.
Mustard is a low-water Rabi crop. Excellent for dry areas.
Sow in Oct. Harvest in Feb-March. Pusa Bold is a good variety.
Aphids (Chepa) attack mustard in Jan. Spray Imidacloprid if needed.
Under PM Kisan Samman Nidhi, farmers get ₹6000 per year in 3 installments of ₹2000.
Check your status at pmkisan.gov.in. e-KYC is mandatory now.
The next installment usually comes in April, August, and December.
Kisan Credit Card (KCC) offers loans at a cheap 4% interest rate (if repaid timely).
You can apply for KCC at any nationalized bank (SBI, PNB, BOB) with your land documents.
Limit depends on your land size and crop scale of finance.
PM Fasal Bima Yojana (PMFBY) covers crop loss due to rain, drought, or pests.
Premium is very low: 2% for Kharif and 1.5% for Rabi crops.
Report crop loss to the insurance company or bank within 72 hours.
Get your soil tested every 2 years. It tells you exactly how much Urea/DAP to use.
Soil Health Card scheme provides a report of your soil's N, P, K, and pH levels.
Contact your district Krishi Vigyan Kendra (KVK) for testing.
DAP contains 18% Nitrogen and 46% Phosphorus. Use it at sowing time.
Nano Urea (Liquid) is a new efficient alternative. 1 bottle = 1 bag of Urea.
Don't overuse Urea; it makes plants susceptible to pests. Balance it with Potash.
Always wear a mask while spraying pesticides.
For weeds: Glyphosate (non-crop area) or Pendimethalin (pre-emergence).
For caterpillars: Emamectin Benzoate or Coragen are effective.
Organic farming reduces costs and improves soil health long-term.
Vermicompost (Kechua Khaad) is 'Black Gold' for soil.
Jeevamrut (Cow dung + urine + jaggery) is an excellent natural growth booster.
Dairy farming is a great side income. Murrah Buffalo and Jersey/HF Cows are high yielders.
Vaccinate animals against FMD (Foot & Mouth) and Lumpy Skin Disease.
Green fodder (Barseem, Napier grass) increases milk production.
Mandi prices change daily. Check the 'Live Mandi' section in this app.
e-NAM (National Agriculture Market) allows you to sell crops online to buyers across India.
Always clean and grade your crop before taking it to Mandi for better rates.
Mango: King of fruits. Watch out for Hopper pests during flowering.
Banana: Tissue culture planting gives uniform yield. Heavy water feeder.
Papaya: High profit in short time (9 months), but very sensitive to viruses.
PM Kusum Yojana gives 60-90% subsidy for Solar Water Pumps.
Drip Irrigation subsidy is available under PMKSY (Per Drop More Crop).
Contact your local Agriculture Officer (ADO) for application forms.
